build.buildCommand: echo Installing frontend deps... && if [ -d frontend ]; then npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build; elif [ -d ../frontend ]; then npm --prefix ../frontend install && npm --prefix ../frontend run build; else echo 'No frontend directory found, skipping frontend build'; fi && echo Installing backend deps... && if [ -d backend ]; then npm --prefix backend install; else npm install; fi

deploy.startCommand: if [ -d backend ]; then cd backend && npm start; else npm start; fi
